title: Democratization of Multimodal Microscopy Imaging: Convergence Across Scales of Imaging Modalities from Single Instrument to Research Technology Centers. Advantages and Challenges
content: In the last two decades, microscopic imaging has undergone a significant expansion in capabilities, driven by unprecedented advancements in engineering solutions. This surge has presented the field of biomedical research with immense potential for previously unimaginable discoveries. However, it has also posed challenges to the administrative structures of organizations responsible for managing or funding such technology, necessitating new standards for human resources to optimize the discovery process.
